name: Bridgedale Ski Lightweight Socks - Women's
description: Combines lovely merino wool with technical fibres to balance insulation with comfort. These lightweight socks offer warmth and cushioning for long days in your boots.Full terry knit foot for added warmth and cushioning with padding through toes, heels, shins and calves.Elasticated arch support prevents bunching and provides a performance fit.Flat toe seam for added comfort.
